item.description:
Finally I wanted to create a support group to meet new people who understand where we are, you are and I am in this crazy post-divorce life.... Let's have some ice breakers and get to know you time....Everyone's got a story to share, so let's listen!

DIRECTIONS!!!!!!!!!
If you're coming from Mass Pike...take ALLSTON/BRIGHTON Exit... pay toll, follow BRIGHTON sign.... road loops around and slightly merges on CAMBRIDGE ST.

Follow Cambridge St (pass HESS); pass over Harvard St (Sports Depot on right)... pass Allston Car wash (on left)... cross over N. Beacon St (this is major intersection - Twin Donuts will be on your right as you pass it...) Keep going straight....

Pass St Elizabeth's Hospital (on left - cambridge st is now washington street).... After hospital next major intersection is MARKET ST - TURN RIGHT..

SoHo will be on the right (quickly) across from the Brooks drug store. Street parking should be available. There is also a parking lot on the right BEFORE soho at the Corrib Pub (i think you can park there too)

It's a pretty straight shot from Pike..

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Boston/Brookline/MA Burbs Divorce Support December Meetup
